DocumentationDRAI Innovation GitHub
Artificial Intelligence is transforming how we interact with technology, and APIs like Google’s Gemini are making it easier than ever to integrate intelligent features into our applications. One of the standout capabilities of the Gemini API is function calling, which allows your AI model to dynamically invoke custom Python functions based on user input. This opens up a world of possibilities — from generating personalized content to integrating external APIs — all within a conversational interface. ![](/llama.svg)
